briefdescription.para: Contains the 8 vertices for the BBox aranged from v[0] = Left-top-Max Z and then rotating clock wise for the top of the BBox The Bottom Square is a mirror of the 1st verts with the Y value changed See constructor code for caluculations.
the min x value of the bbox
the max x value of the bbox
the min y value of the bbox
the max y value of the bbox
the min z value of the bbox
the max z value of the bbox
This is the center of the BBox stored for caluculations in other classes s.
used to store the 6 Normal faces for the BBox used for calculating BBox collisions if needed
Width of the BBox.
Height of the BBox.
Depth of the BBox.
a pointer to the VAO buffer used for drawing the bbox
sets the draw mode for the BBox Faces, set to GL_LINE for line faces and GL_FILL for filled
Bounding Box ctor using a Center and the 3 dimensions of the BBox.

parameterdescription.para: the width of the BBox (== X coord).
the height of the BBox (== Y coord).
the Depth of the BBox (== Z coord).

memberdef.argsstring: (Real _minX, Real _maxX, Real _minY, Real _maxY, Real _minZ, Real _maxZ) noexcept
memberdef.name: BBox

briefdescription.para: ctor using +/- x,y,z dimensions

parameterdescription.para: the x position of the min x extent
the x position of the max x extent
the y position of the min y extent
the y position of the max y extent
the z position of the min z extent
the z position of the max z extent

briefdescription.para: Default constructor will create a BBox centered at point 0,0,0 With Unit length width and height (== 1)
copy ctor
Draw Method draws the BBox using OpenGL.
reset the draw mode for the BBox
dtor no dynamic memory so empty
the min x value of the bbox

accessor for the width of the BBox
set the width

parameterdescription.para: the width to set will re-calculate bbox and VAO
flag to indicate if we need to recalc the vao defauts to true

briefdescription.para: Height of the BBox.
set the height

parameterdescription.para: the height to set will re-calculate bbox and VAO
flag to indicate if we need to recalc the vao defauts to true

briefdescription.para: Depth of the BBox.
set the depth

parameterdescription.para: the depth to set will re-calculate bbox and VAO
flag to indicate if we need to recalc the vao defauts to true

briefdescription.para: the array of normals for the BBox
the array of verts for the BBox
set the center of the BBox and re-calculate the extents

parameterdescription.para: the new center of the BBox

briefdescription.para: recalculate the bbox values once things have been changed this will also re-do the VAO
method used to set the vao
Simple Bounding box class used in various parts of ngl and other example programs.

simplesect.para: Last Revision updated to use Vec3 to fit with new shader attribute pipeline
